subject: Follow-up on Order #SSN5962
description_text:
I am writing to follow up on my order *#SSN5962*. The order was paid for
more than a week ago, and I also paid extra for faster shipping. However,
the order status still shows as not dispatched.

Could you please clarify the reason for the delay and advise when the order
will be shipped?

Thank you for your assistance.

Kind regards,
Daniill

conversations.body_text: Hi Daniil Pilipenko,  We apologize for the delay. Two shipments destined for our German warehouse have been affected by heavy snowfall in Europe, causing road blockages and delivery delays. We will expedite delivery or explore alternative logistics channels to ship your order from China as soon as possible. Compensation will be provided based on the delay after your order is completed. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.
